alert.note: Alert for Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:19AM CDT until June 12 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND WESTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 919 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodlawn, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 912 AM CDT...trained spotter southwest of Seneca reported quarter size hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hiawatha, Sabetha, Seneca, Fairview, Morrill, Bern, Powhattan, Oneida, Hamlin, Kickapoo Reservation and Woodlawn. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
